resources.string: It’s okay to let go from time to time, just don’t overdo it. Things have a way of righting themselves over time.
This seems like a medical question. Call your doctor for more assistance.

string-array.name: bootsorshoes
string-array.item: Should I wear boots or shoes?

resources.string: Boots can help you during rainfalls but can be pretty heavy. Shoes are the traditional wear but don\'t help you in any sport or condition.

string-array.name: museumormovie
string-array.item: Should I go to a museum or movie?

resources.string: Museums can be intellectually stimulating with art and films but can be boring if you don\'t like art. Movies are a great way to hang with your friends but may not mean much to learn something.

string-array.name: applesororanges
string-array.item: Should I eat apples or oranges?

resources.string: Apples are a great antioxidant having high fiber, Vitamin A and C but they may contain pesticides. On the other hand, oranges have high amounts of calcium but they may be harmful in large dosages.

string-array.name: tacoorburrito
string-array.item: Should I eat tacos or burritos?

resources.string: Tacos are a quick snack in Mexico and are usually garnished with toppings. Burritos are a large dinner meal with a bean filling typically added with cheese.

string-array.name: jacket
string-array.item: Should I wear a jacket or rainjacket?

resources.string: Check the weather. It will usually dictate about which clothing is helpful in the climate.

string-array.name: youtubeortv
string-array.item: Should I watch YouTube or TV?

resources.string: Though YouTube can be enjoyable watching straight through your computer, it will run out of your constant feeds. TV does this as well but can space out between each redone episode.

string-array.name: vorc
string-array.item: Which ice cream should I get?

resources.string: Vanilla gives you the highest energy boost out of all ice cream. But, chocolate can give you a thinking boost for your brain.
Eat some fruits or vegetables.\n If you\'re really craving it, then you can have some junk food just do it in moderation.

string-array.name: sleep
string-array.item: What time should I go to sleep?

resources.string: Try to go to sleep at a reasonable hour so you get around 8 hours of sleep.\n You should only pull an all-nighter if you absolutely need to do something productive.
Lower your expectations. You only need to study and leave the rest to your wits.
Then, why did you download the app?
How do you do, user?\n How about telling me some decisions to help you?
Yes, now is definitely the time to present.
